xdm:personalFinances.description: Financial details including transactions, accounts, and applications.

xdm:balanceTransfers.description: Captures the details of balance transfers between accounts.

xdm:accountTo.description: Extension of financialAccount data type.  Details the account to which the balance is being transferred.
